title: ADDITIONAL DOCUMENTATION
fullText:
The following documentation shall be provided, confirming that all required testing and inspections have been carried out. These documents shall be provided in addition to the documentation required by Clause 2.2.1.
(a)	a commissioning checklist in accordance with Appendix B; or
(b)	a routine inspection for body-protected electrical areas checklist in accordance with Appendix E; or
(c)	a routine inspection for cardiac-protected electrical areas checklist in accordance with Appendix F.
NOTE: Additional documentation may be required in accordance with the relevant state or national legislation. An example of a typical recording form is shown in Appendix C of this Standard.
